casebody.data:
BEATENHEAD
v.
LINCOLN CO. No. 105PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 7, 2005. Ann S. Estridge, Meredith T. Black, Raleigh, for Martin Eaddy.

Suzanne Beatenhead, Pro Se.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of January 2005 by NC School Boards Assoc. & NC Association of County Commisioners for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot. By order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of February 2005."
